$firehoseClient = new Aws\Firehose\FirehoseClient([
    'profile' => 'default',
    'version' => '2015-08-04',
    'region' => 'us-east-2'
]);

$name = "my_stream_name";

try {
    $result = $firehoseClient->deleteDeliveryStream([
        'DeliveryStreamName' => $name,
    ]);
    var_dump($result);
} catch (AwsException $e) {
    // output error message if fails
    echo $e->getMessage();
    echo "\n";
}
